metadata.title: CVE-2018-18313 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Perl before 5.26.3 has a buffer over-read via a crafted regular expressionthat triggers disclosure of sensitive information from process memory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18313` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libperl5.26 - 5.26.1-6ubuntu0.3
perl - 5.26.1-6ubuntu0.3
perl-base - 5.26.1-6ubuntu0.3
perl-debug - 5.26.1-6ubuntu0.3
perl-modules-5.26 - 5.26.1-6ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: perl package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.26.1-6ubuntu0.3').
